The House Majority Office released a vid: pupil funding increased by $101, not just 47 cents.
The state: s 2018-19 education budget increased public school spending by over $485 million.
Per: pupil funding in 2017-18 was $7,307, and it increased slightly to $7,408 per student in 2018-19, resulting in an increase of $101.50.
The: 101 increase is an average, and the actual amount of per-pupil funding varies depending on the county and factors such as new state mandates and expected student decrease.
